short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Questrade Real Time Quote automatically clicks the refresh quote in Questrade every second.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Questrade real-time quote clicks the snap quote button for you, all of them in the present view so that you don't have to. Questrade caps the snap quotes to 99,999/month so make sure you do not have questrade open when you aren't using it. Keeping it out of focus also works as I have purposely made my extension so that it does not refresh the quote if the tab is not active.
